tags.name: Users
tags.description:
Managing Users.
ℹ️ Users are end user identities that have authenticated with one of the allowed sign on methods.
Each user receives an EVM (Ethereum) compatible "L2" cryptographic identity or wallet by default and additional wallets/IDs can be linked if required.

tags.name: Chats
tags.description: Chat endpoints (rooms, members, messages helpers) complementing the primary XMPP chat flow.

tags.name: Files
tags.description: Managing user uploaded files. ℹ️ Used for chat attachments, documents, user profiles, room media, digital collectibles, etc.

tags.name: Sharelinks
tags.description:
Secure sharing links for resources such as User Profiles and Documents.
ℹ️ Used when resource is not public and/or encrypted.

tags.name: Apps
tags.description:
Managing Apps and their settings.
ℹ️ Mostly used by admin panel / platform management; less common for external integrations.

AppJwtAuth.description: App JWT. Use this token to call app-authorized endpoints (e.g. create user, login, signup). Authorization: Bearer <JWT>

UserJwtAuth.description: User JWT. Use this token for user-authorized endpoints (e.g. chats/files/sharelinks/me). Authorization: Bearer <JWT>

RefreshJwtAuth.description: Refresh JWT. Use this token only for refresh flow. Authorization: Bearer <JWT>

error.description: A brief, human-readable message about the error.

details.description: Optional, more specific details about the error (e.g., validation errors).

Limit.name: limit
Limit.description: Max number of items to return.

Offset.name: offset
Offset.description: Number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

200.description:
```
{
  app: {
    _id: string,
    displayName: string,
    domainName: string,
    creatorId: string,
    bundleId: string,
    primaryColor: string,
    secondaryColor: string,
    coinSymbol: string,
    coinName: boolean,
    defaultAccessProfileOpen: boolean,
    defaultAccessAssetsOpen: boolean,
    usersCanFree: boolean,
    isUserDataEncrypted: boolean,
    parentAppId: boolean,
    isAllowedNewAppCreate: boolean,
    isBaseApp: boolean,
    defaultRooms: [{jid: string, pinned: boolean}],
    createdAt: string,
    updatedAt: string,
    appToken: string,
    stats: {
      totalRegistered: number,
      recentlyRegistered: number,
      totalSessions: number,
      recentlySessions: number,
      totalApiCalls: number,
      recentlyApiCalls: number,
      totalFiles: number,
      recentlyFiles: number,
      totalTransactions: number,
      recentlyTransactions: number,
      totalIssuance: number,
      recentlyIssuance: number,
    }
  },
}
```

```
}
```

post.description:
**Auth**: App JWT

End user login endpoint, should be used with Authorization header set to App JWT.
Ethora App JWT example: JWT eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..dnvrO_dQ_2GLyUX-b71CcHFDnphpjeTYOxz6vZ2fsPY

```
type CoinBalance = {tokenName: string, tokenSymbol: string, balance: number, contractAddress: string},
type NFTBalance = {
  tokenName: string, 
  balance: number, 
  total: number, 
  imagePreview: string, 
  constractTokenIds: [number], 
  nftId: string,
  tokenType: string,
  nftFileUrl: string,
  nftMetaUrl: string,
  nftOriginalname: string,
  nftMimetype: string,
  createdAt: string,
  updatedAt: string,
  contractAddress: string,
},
axios.response.data = {
  balances: [CoinBalance | NFTBalance],
  documents: [],
  firstName: string,
  lastName: string,
  description: string,
  profileImage: string,
}
```

```
type CoinBalance = {tokenName: string, tokenSymbol: string, balance: number, contractAddress: string},
type NFTBalance = {
  tokenName: string, 
  balance: number, 
  total: number, 
  imagePreview: string, 
  constractTokenIds: [number], 
  nftId: string,
  tokenType: string,
  nftFileUrl: string,
  nftMetaUrl: string,
  nftOriginalname: string,
  nftMimetype: string,
  createdAt: string,
  updatedAt: string,
  contractAddress: string,
},
axios.response.data = {
  balances: [CoinBalance | NFTBalance],
  documents: [],
  firstName: string,
  lastName: string,
  description: string,
  profileImage: string,
}
```
